name: SecTransformMetaAttributeType
desc: The keys that describe the metadata attributes of transform attributes.

items.name: case hasInboundConnection
items.desc: The attribute has an inbound connection.

items.name: case hasOutboundConnections
items.desc: The attribute has an outbound connection.

items.name: case ref
items.desc: A direct reference to an attribute's value.

items.name: case required
items.desc: Indicates whether the attribute value is optional.

items.name: case requiresOutboundConnection
items.desc: The attribute requires an outbound connection.

items.name: case value
items.desc: The actual value of the attribute.
